price: Wͻn mu biara (nnihͻ a wͻgye diiε), na mmom wͻbuu Asomafoͻ no atorofoͻ, enti M’asotwee no yεε nokorε.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
